name: Blind Rider
description:
It is an audio game so you have to play the game using the sounds you hear and there is no visual content. There are 3 roads in the game and you have to maneuver using these 3 roads in order not to hit the obstacle coming your way.

CONTROLS

The game starts with the space key and you can change your path with the right and left arrow keys.

TEAM

We made the game by using Unity for the BAU final project.
